text: Please read the following instructions carefully. These instructions will not be displayed during the actual survey.
data.caption: Introduction

text: A colleague asks you to help him with a problem in the source code of another project.
The code works, but behaves unexpectedly. Your colleague needs your help analyzing the error so they can change the implementation later.
data.caption: Situation

text: Here you can see a snippet with a function written in C#.
The code is commented. The purpose of the function is stated in the first comment line. The remaining comments contain an overview of the variables used in the code.
data.caption: Survey

text: Your task is to find a bug in the code.
The code compiles correctly, but it exhibits erroneous behavior at runtime. The function has only one error.
data.caption: Your task

text: During the study, only a few lines of the code are visible, the rest are hidden.
data.caption: Visible area

text: You can move the visible area using the arrow keys on your keyboard. Now move the visible area to the end (by pressing the down arrow key)!
data.caption: Controlls

text: Once you're sure you've found the error, press the spacebar. A dialog will appear.
(Now press the spacebar.)
data.caption: Error found

text: If you find the error, please indicate the line number where the error is located. The selected line will be highlighted.
data.caption: Line number

text: Please enter the correct code in the "Correction" field. The field will be prefilled with the selected line so you can correct the code.
data.caption: Correction

text: Please also provide a brief description of the error and explain what exactly is wrong.
data.caption: Description

text: The "Back to Code" button will take you back to the code if you are unsure about the error.
data.caption: Cancel

text: To complete a round, click the "Done" button.
data.caption: Done

text: You have a maximum of 3 attempts to find the error in a snippet of code.
Please try to find the error without guessing and only press the spacebar when you are sure.
data.caption: Try

text: You have up to 10 minutes to find the error. Try to find it as quickly as possible. However, accuracy is more important than speed.
A warning will appear shortly before the end. After the time has elapsed, the next snippet will automatically be displayed.
data.caption: Time limit

text: In summary, your task is:
- Find the error that causes the broken behavior
- Move the visible area with the arrow keys
- Press the spacebar when you find the error
- You have up to 10 minutes per code snippet
- You have a maximum of 3 attempts per code snippet to find the error
data.caption: Summary
